job_tasks.phrase: ontwerpen, implementeren en optimaliseren van generatieve AI-oplossingen
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the core engineering activities of creating and deploying AI solutions, aligning with the definition of building and integrating software.
The definition of this category explicitly mentions RAG systems, and expertise in them is key to the role.
LLMs are central to generative AI, and expertise in them is key to building the described AI systems, fitting the application of LLMs.
Expertise in vector databases is directly tied to the implementation of RAG systems, as defined in this category.
This phrase highlights the role's responsibility in managing the data-to-output pipeline, which is a key aspect of data engineering for AI systems.

job_tasks.phrase: zorgt ervoor dat onze modellen precies datgene leveren wat onze klanten nodig hebben
job_tasks.justification: This phrase emphasizes the outcome-oriented nature of the role, ensuring the AI models' outputs are aligned with customer needs, a key aspect of applying generative AI effectively.

soft_skills.phrase: zorg je voor AI-systemen die snel, nauwkeurig en impactvol zijn
soft_skills.justification: Ensuring systems are 'impactful' points to a pragmatic approach focused on delivering valuable outcomes.

soft_skills.phrase: zorgt ervoor dat onze modellen precies datgene leveren wat onze klanten nodig hebben
soft_skills.justification: Understanding customer needs is a key aspect of business understanding, ensuring technical solutions align with market requirements.

profile.rationale: The job advertisement lists one task related to core software engineering (1.A.1) and five tasks related to Generative AI specialization (1.B.2, 1.B.3). The explicit mention of RAG, LLMs, and vector databases clearly indicates a focus on Generative AI. This distribution means the role is predominantly focused on AI specialization, fitting the GenAI Specialist profile.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad is clear about the core technologies and responsibilities, but it is brief. While the profile is strongly indicated, a bit more detail on the software engineering aspects could provide further nuance.
